attribute.name: drlReportLayout
attribute.value: <document> <styles> <style name="atlGeneral" font="Arial" size="12" colour="black" format="" /> <style name="atlNotForProduction" font="Arial" size="30" colour="red" format="stroke" strokeColour="red" strokeWidth="1"/> <style name="atlObsolete" font="Arial" size="30" colour="red" format="stroke" strokeColour="red" strokeWidth="1"/> <style name="bold" font="Arial" size="9" format="bold"/> <style name="normal" font="Arial" size="9" format="" default="true"/> <style name="large" font="Arial" size="100" format="bold" colour="black" strokeColour="blue" strokeWidth="10" /> <style name="H1" font="Arial" size="14" format="bold" colour="red" /> <style name="H2" font="Arial" size="10" format="bold" colour="green"/> <style name="H3" font="Arial" size="20" format="" default="true"/> <style name="small" font="Arial" size="5" format="" /> <style name="smallbold" font="Arial" size="5" format="bold" /> </styles> <pages> <page> <name>AllPages</name> <pageRange>-</pageRange> <unitOfMeasure>MM</unitOfMeasure> <watermarks> <if> <condition leftHandSource="mql selectable" leftHandValue="current" condition="=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="Obsolete"/> <elements> <watermark style="atlObsolete" horizontalPosition="center" verticalPosition="center" alignment="middle" rotation="45" height="80" width="300" underlay="false"> <text>OBSOLETE</text> </watermark> </elements> </if> </watermarks> </page> </pages> </document>

relationship.relationshipType: DRLTools Copy Values Target Attribute Relationship
